summary: Added workflow-level validation panel with validation engine and UI integration

validation_engine.description: Core validation logic for workflow analysis
checks: Missing entry point detection (HTTP Handler, Kafka Handler, Cron Trigger, Workflow Submit)
Required configuration validation for all 24 node types

api.validate_workflow: Validates a workflow and returns ValidationResult
api.ValidationResult: Contains issues list with error/warning counts and validity status
api.ValidationIssue: Holds severity, message, and optional node_id for navigation

validation_panel.description: Collapsible UI panel showing validation results
features: Error/warning count display with colored indicators
Clickable issues that navigate to problematic nodes
Color-coded severity icons (red for errors, amber for warnings)
Empty state showing 'All checks passed' when valid

run_button_integration.description: Run button blocks execution on validation errors
run_button_integration.behavior: Clicking Run with validation errors expands the panel instead of executing

unit_tests: Configuration validation for HTTP Handler, Kafka Handler, Cron Trigger
